title: BRIEF-Virgin Australia Enters Term Sheet With Affinity To BuyBack Its 35% Stake for $700 Mln
text:
BRIEF-Virgin Australia Enters Term Sheet With Affinity To BuyBack Its 35% Stake for $700 Mln

Stock Markets 19 minutes ago (Sep 16, 2019 09:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Virgin Australia Enters Term Sheet With Affinity To BuyBack Its 35% Stake for $700 Mln Sept 16 (Reuters) - Virgin Australia Holdings Ltd : * UPDATE ON VELOCITY FREQUENT FLYER * ENTERED INTO A TERM SHEET WITH AFFINITY TO BUY BACK ITS 35% MINORITY INVESTMENT FOR $700 MILLION. * COMPLETION OF TRANSACTION IS EXPECTED TO OCCUR BEFORE END OF 2019. * ENTERED INTO A TERM SHEET WITH AFFINITY TO BUY BACK ITS 35% MINORITY INVESTMENT FOR $700 MILLION

BRIEF-Virgin Australia Enters Term Sheet With Affinity To BuyBack Its 35% Stake for $700 Mln
description: BRIEF-Virgin Australia Enters Term Sheet With Affinity To BuyBack Its 35% Stake for $700 Mln
